comment.author: 51039755@N05
comment._content: The above link will take you to the Museum's website where the image can be zoomed. On the zoomed image the last three digits of the WD number on the tank on the far left are visible, these are 043. The tank is possibly 6043, a Mk IV supply tank that served with the 3rd tank carrier Company in August 1918. Source: sites.google.com/site/landships/home/lists/mkivtanks/worl...
